com.here.sdk.routing

Class FarePrice

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.here.sdk.routing.FarePrice

  • public final class FarePrice
extends java.lang.Object

    Price of a fare.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      java.lang.String currency
      Local currency of the price compliant to ISO 4217.
      boolean estimated
      True when the fare price is estimated based on best guess and the actual price may differ.
      double maximum
      Maximum price when the price is of FarePriceType.RANGE type.
      double minimum
      Minimum price when the price is of FarePriceType.RANGE type.
      FarePriceType type
      Type of price represented by this object.
      java.lang.Integer unit
      Deprecated. 

      Will be removed in v4.10.0. Use FarePrice.validityPeriodInSeconds instead.
      java.lang.Integer validityPeriodInSeconds
      When set, the price is paid for a specific duration.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    • Field Detail

      • type

        @NonNull
public FarePriceType type

        Type of price represented by this object.

      • estimated

        public boolean estimated

        True when the fare price is estimated based on best guess and the actual price may differ. It is false when the price is not estimated.

      • currency

        @NonNull
public java.lang.String currency

        Local currency of the price compliant to ISO 4217. For example, "GBP" for the British pound sterling.

      • unit

        @Deprecated
 @Nullable
public java.lang.Integer unit
        Deprecated. 

        Will be removed in v4.10.0. Use FarePrice.validityPeriodInSeconds instead.

        When set, the price is paid for a specific duration.

        Examples:

        3600 seconds - price for one hour

        28800 seconds - price for eight hours

        86400 seconds - price for one day

      • validityPeriodInSeconds

        @Nullable
public java.lang.Integer validityPeriodInSeconds

        When set, the price is paid for a specific duration.

        Examples:

        3600 seconds - price for one hour

        28800 seconds - price for eight hours

        86400 seconds - price for one day

        Note: When the ticket validity period starts depends on the Agency providing the service.

      • minimum

        public double minimum

        Minimum price when the price is of FarePriceType.RANGE type. Otherwise, it is equal to FarePrice.maximum.

      • maximum

        public double maximum

        Maximum price when the price is of FarePriceType.RANGE type. Otherwise, it is equal to FarePrice.minimum.
